user_query: I want to organize a company trip to North America and need information about cities in North America sorted by overall score, and calculate the distance in kilometers between Birmingham, Alabama and Sacramento, California including their latitude and longitude.

TaskList.description: Gather information about cities in North America sorted by overall score.
Retrieve the latitude and longitude of Birmingham, Alabama.
Retrieve the latitude and longitude of Sacramento, California.
Calculate the distance in kilometers between Birmingham, Alabama and Sacramento, California using the retrieved latitude and longitude.
